name: Japanese Flowering Quince Bonsai Tree

reviews.name: Japanese Flowering Quince Bonsai Tree
reviews.reviewText: This plant arrived in perfect condition. Has many sturdy branches, much larger than I anticipated. Already beginning to leaf out for spring bloom. Excellent quality for the price.
reviews.title: Beautiful Blossoms

reviews.name: Japanese Flowering Quince Bonsai Tree
reviews.reviewText: Shipped very carefully...arrived in excellent shape and in record time.
reviews.title: Japanese Floweing Quince Bonsai Tree

reviews.name: Japanese Flowering Quince Bonsai Tree
reviews.reviewText: Excellent Specimen, the tree was already blooming white & pinkish flowers
reviews.title: Great purchase ...Big Bang for the Buck
